name: ARGEBE
description:
ARGEBE is a minimal stylized multiplayer FPS game with basic yet unique gameplay.

This is an early pre-alpha version of ARGEBE.

Because of server limitations, application runtime is limited to one hour.

After one hour the application will automatically close.

Once the application has closed you are free to reopen and reconnect to the game.

If you enjoy recording or streaming your sessions please feel  free to share your recording in the comments below... I love watching your gameplay ❤️

If you are an established streamer or gamer and would like to play a dedicated game with your audience or other friends please reach out via the private builds topic in the comments below and I will organise a custom build for you.

***Mac users*** once you have extracted the zip archive right click and select open. Then select open in the pop up window. You may have to do this twice before the app will work. If it still doesn't work after a couple of tries check you approved application settings allows for uncertified /unsigned applications 🌟
